description:
When you can pair your love of flannel with your love for the planet, you know you're onto something good. Made from 100% organic cotton, the Dolberg Flannel Shirt has a light footprint, helping to keep chemicals out of our soil and waterways and using less water than conventional cotton.

But that's not all that's light about this classic flannel. It's lightweight too, which makes it a comfortable choice any time of the year. And with so many colorways to pick from, it's truly a flannel for all seasons.
name: Prana Dolberg Flannel Shirt - Slim - Mens
